entries.name: new(markup = nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new formatter that will output HTML-safe labels

entries.name: convert(text)
entries.desc: Converts text to an HTML-safe label

entries.name: handle_regexp_CROSSREF(target)
entries.desc: Converts the CROSSREF target to plain text, removing the suppression marker, if any

entries.name: handle_regexp_TIDYLINK(target)
entries.desc: Converts the TIDYLINK target to just the text part
